subject: Fix non-sequential slide IDs in V4_FIXED deck
description: Create and run Python script to renumber all slides sequentially (1-25) in DECK_ENTERPRISE_V4_FIXED.html. Current issue: slide IDs jump from slide-5 to slide-new-demo-overview, breaking navigation. Script should create mapping, update all IDs and anchor links, and save as V5_RENUMBERED.html.
